scripts.build:prod:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TOKEN=dynamic REGION=uk webpack --mode production
scripts.build:fun:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=production GAME_MODE=fun REGION=uk webpack --mode production
scripts.build:cheat_tool:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=production GAME_MODE=cheat_tool REGION=uk webpack --mode production
scripts.build:logs:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=production GAME_MODE=logs REGION=uk webpack --mode production
scripts.dev:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REGION=uk webpack serve --mode development
scripts.dev:fun: cross-env NODE_ENV=development GAME_MODE=fun webpack serve --mode development
scripts.dev:fun:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=development GAME_MODE=fun REGION=uk webpack serve --mode development
scripts.dev:cheat_tool: cross-env NODE_ENV=development GAME_MODE=cheat_tool webpack serve --mode development
scripts.dev:cheat_tool:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=development GAME_MODE=cheat_tool REGION=uk webpack serve --mode development
scripts.dev:logs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development GAME_MODE=logs webpack serve --mode development
scripts.dev:logs:uk: cross-env NODE_ENV=development GAME_MODE=logs REGION=uk webpack serve --mode development
scripts.test-all: npm run check-format && npm run check-lint && npm run check-types && npm run build
